Entries.{{ModID}}_ABitSad/f FC.Zuuie 500/e {{Mod: night_market/-1000 -1000/farmer 18 60 0 FC.Jinx 17 50 2 FC.Zuuie 22 54 2 FC.Barron 36 51 3/viewport 17 52 clamp true/skippable/addConversationTopic FC.ABitSad/showFRame FC.Zuuie 16/positionOffset FC.Jinx -40 0/showFrame FC.Jinx 22/pause 1000/emote FC.Jinx 32/pause 1000/showFrame FC.Zuuie 17/pause 150/showFrame FC.Zuuie 18/pause 150/showFrame FC.Zuuie 19/pause 150/showFrame FC.Zuuie 20/pause 150/showFrame FC.Zuuie 14/pause 200/advancedMove FC.Zuuie false -3 0 3 600 0 -4 3 10/pause 300/emote FC.Zuuie 20/pause 500/showFrame FC.Jinx 16/pause 400/pause 400/shake FC.Jinx 1500/pause 1500/advancedMove farmer false 0 -4 4 3000 0 -4 4 10/speak FC.Zuuie "My friend, my friend.$1"/pause 200/showFrame FC.Jinx 4/pause 200/speak FC.Zuuie "I missed you.$2#$b#But, you enjoyed playing with the others? At the refuge?$2#$b#You look so bright too!$1#$b#Beautiful!$1"/pause 300/playSound {{ModID}}_Thylacine/pause 200/faceDirection FC.Zuuie 2/pause 200/textAbovehead FC.Zuuie "{{PlayerName}}?"/pause 200/speak FC.Zuuie "It's not safe for humans, not out this late.$2#$b#But with us just maybe, you'll be safe!$1"/pause 200/faceDirection FC.Zuuie 3/pause 200/speak FC.Zuuie "Jinx was telling me about all the fun she had at the refuge!$1#$b#But...I can't help but feel bad...$2#$b#Those poor creatures, having to leave their home behind.$2#$b#Having to leave Arcania.$2"/pause 200/speak FC.Zuuie "I grew here...$2#$b#I wish could play with zoots like how Jinx played with other Thylacines.$2"/pause 1000/advancedMove FC.Jinx false 0 2 1 10 0 0 1 10/pause 1000/playSound {{ModID}}_Thylacine/pause 200/faceDirection FC.Zuuie 3/pause 150/faceDirection FC.Zuuie 2/pause 200/speak FC.Jinx "Jinx nuzzles your hand.$2"/pause 200/playSound {{ModID}}_Thylacine/pause 200/speak FC.Zuuie "Jinx is so sweet, she says that you and her can play with me!$1"/pause 200/speak FC.Zuuie "Would you? I always wanted to play hide and seek!$1"/quickQuestion #I would love to play with you and Jinx.#It's too dark right now, I need to get home.(break)speak FC.Jinx "You've made Jinx happy, she wants everyone to play together and fun.$1"\friendship FC.Jinx 5(break)speak FC.Jinx "You've made Jinx sad...But she does understand, she hopes when the sun rises. You all can play together in the leaves.$2"/friendship FC.Jinx -5/pause 1000/advancedMove FC.Barron false -14 0 2 10 0 2 3 10 -2 0 3 10/speak FC.Barron "Jinx?$2#$b#Where are you girl?$2#$b#It's time to come inside.$2"/pause 200/emote FC.Zuuie 16/showFrame FC.Zuuie 20/pause 200/speed FC.Zuuie 5/advancedMove FC.Zuuie false 0 -2 1 10 1 0 2 10/pause 400/showFrame FC.Zuuie 19/pause 150/showFrame FC.Zuuie 18/pause 150/showFrame FC.Zuuie 17/pause 150/showFrame FC.Zuuie 16/pause 150/speak FC.Barron "@? You're out pretty late.$1"/pause 100/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 200/speak FC.Barron "Be careful okay, Passerby gets a little weird at night.$2#$b#Come on Jinx, let's go home.$1"/advancedmove FC.Barron false 2 0 1 10 0 -2 1 10 13 0 4 10 0 -10 4 10/pause 200/advancedmove FC.Jinx false 0 2 2 10 0 0 2 200 5 0 3 10 0 -2 3 10 13 0 4 10 0 -9 4 10/pause 200/emote FC.Jinx 28/pause 200/viewport move 1 -1 6000000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
